name: Atelier: The Alchemist of Arland 1-2-3 DX - Premium Box
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- Atelier Rorona: The Alchemist of Arland DX
- Atelier Totori The Adventurer of Arland DX
- Atelier Meruru The Apprentice of Arland DX
- Original Soundtrack DLC (While supplies last)
- Alchemists of Arland Mini-Crystal Paperweight
- Rorona, Tototri, and Meruru Connectic Acrylic Mini Charm Set
